created.description: The time at which the population entry was created.

populations.description: The hash of each population the worker is configured to evolve.

platform_info.description: The SHA256 of the platform_info describing the platform the worker is running on.

sub_processes.description: The number of sub-processes spawned each cycle.

biome_connection_str.description: The configured postgresql connection string for the biome.

microbiome_connection_str.description: The configured postgresql connection string for the microbiome.

gene_pool_connection_str.description: The configured postgresql connection string for the gene pool.
